title.value: Interoceptive technologies for psychiatric interventions: From diagnosis to clinical applications
title.justification: The title is prominently displayed at the beginning of the document, indicating the focal point of the research paper.
title.quote: Interoceptive technologies for psychiatric interventions: From diagnosis to clinical applications

extractions.description: This paper reviews interoceptive technologies and their applications in psychiatric interventions. It discusses their relevance in understanding mental health disorders and emphasizes the need for standardized measures across domains before these technologies can be effectively translated into clinical settings.

type.justification: The paper reviews existing paradigms and suggests classifications, indicating it is based on empirical analysis of existing research and technologies.
type.quote: Following a general introduction to the neurophysiology of interoception as hierarchical predictive processing, we review the existing paradigms for manipulating interoception...

name.justification: The paper is primarily focused on psychiatric interventions and the use of interoceptive technologies in mental health.
name.quote: Interoceptive technologies for psychiatric interventions: From diagnosis to clinical applications

name.justification: The paper discusses neurophysiological aspects and predictive processing related to interoception.
name.quote: Despite the importance of interoception in cognitive neuroscience and psychiatry...

name.quote: This article integrates diverse research efforts from psychology, physiology, psychiatry, and engineering...
